set.name: DMART-13 Fabulous Art: Duema x Duema Play's

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you summon this creature into the battle zone, you may draw up to 3 cards. {TRIPLE BREAKER} {CENTER GOD LINK} (As you put this creature or another God into the battle zone, you may unlink any number of your Gods. Then you may link this creature to a God that has "Right God Link" and/or "Left God Link".) ■ If this creature is linked as 3 cards, your shields can't break.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-13 Fabulous Art: Duema x Duema Play's

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If you have 5 or more Angel Command creatures in the battle zone, you may summon this creature for no cost. ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Angel Commands. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Your opponent can't cast spells. ■ Your opponent's creatures cost 5 more to summon.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-13 Fabulous Art: Duema x Duema Play's

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this tamaseed, you may draw 3 cards. If you do, discard 2 cards from your hand. ■ If you don't have a total of 4 or more water creatures and/or water tamaseeds, this tamaseed isn't treated as a creature in the battle zone. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of the following: ► You may use a tamaseed that costs 5 or less from your graveyard for no cost: ► You may cast a spell that costs 5 or less from your graveyard for no cost. If you do, after you cast that spell, put it on the bottom of your deck instead.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-13 Fabulous Art: Duema x Duema Play's

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, you may put the top 4 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then you may put a creature that costs 8 or less from your graveyard that can evolve from this creature on top of this creature.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-13 Fabulous Art: Duema x Duema Play's

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ Mana Arms 9: Whenever this creature attacks, if you have 9 or more fire cards in your mana zone, untap this creature, and this creature gets +3000 power until the end of the turn. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever your opponent chooses this creature, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have power equal to or less than it.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-13 Fabulous Art: Duema x Duema Play's

property.name: Rules
property.value: {NEO EVOLUTION}: You may put it on one of your Nature creatures. (If a creature is under it, treat it as a Neo Evolution Creature.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature and put it into its owner's mana zone. ■ Whenever one of your neo creatures attacks, you may put a creature that has power less than that creature from your mana zone into the battle zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-13 Fabulous Art: Duema x Duema Play's
